attributes.action: Abolish the Scottish Parliament and restore democratic equality throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scottish Parliament is but another layer of bureaucracy between the Scottish people and Westminster.  It is incompetent and corrupt.  It is a failure.  It is nothing short of a milestone round the neck of the Scottish  people.  Let us abolish it now, the lesson has been learned.
